channel.title: I Have 2 Small But Major Problems For Me Can Someone Help
channel.description:
1.) I Can't Figure Out Why None Of My Player Commands Are Working
2.) When I Go Into My Characters Folder And Open My Character "****".txt file to edit playerRights I save my changes to the file but when I log back in to my server they reset back to playerRights = 0
I can't Figure out why this isn't working can someone please help me through these problems

item.title: I Have 2 Small But Major Problems For Me Can Someone Help
item.dc:creator: @Dblocknc005 Dblocknc005
item.description:
@Dblocknc005 wrote:

1.) Could it be Because my server won’t connect to the public, I can only get it to connect to localhost i can’t get it to connect to my (no-ip.org) server host, Cause when i change the player rights i’m signed off but when i sign on to the localhost they reset again back to = 0

Read full topic

sendMessage(“You Now Have Torags Armour”);
addItem(4745, 1);
addItem(4749, 1);
addItem(4751, 1);
addItem(995, 100000000);
}

item.title: I Have 2 Small But Major Problems For Me Can Someone Help
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

else if (command.startsWith("pickup") && playerRights >= 2) { try { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,11)); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(12)); if (/*newItemID <= 10000 && */newItemID >= 0) { addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { sendMessage("No such item."); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::pickup 0995 10"); } }

im not sure, sorry. i have something coded into my pickup command that put in. but im not sure unless looking at another pickups command sorry.

you also need playerRights 2 or higher to do the command. admin+

item.title: I Have 2 Small But Major Problems For Me Can Someone Help
item.dc:creator: @Dblocknc005 Dblocknc005
item.description:
@Dblocknc005 wrote:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“torags”) && playerRights >= 2) {
sendMessage(“You Now Have Torags Armour”);
addItem(4745, 1);
addItem(4749, 1);
addItem(4751, 1);
addItem(995, 100000000);
}

    }

And

else if (command.startsWith(“pickup”) && playerRights >= 2)
{
try {
int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,11));
int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(12));
if (/*newItemID <= 10000 && */newItemID >= 0) {
addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
} else {
sendMessage(“No such item.”);
}
} catch(Exception e) {
sendMessage(“Wrong Syntax! Use as ::pickup 0995 10”);
}
}

Read full topic
